genre_description: Urban realism blended with speculative elements, depicting a high-stakes struggle for survival assisted by an advanced strategic AI.

ai_characters.name: Praxis
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, voice-based AI that provides Chris Gardner with real-time logistics, social engineering data, and strategic advice to navigate homelessness and professional competition.

behaviors.description: Provides precise logistical data, including bus routes and construction delays, to ensure the protagonist stays on a strict schedule.
behaviors.quote: The 1 California runs every few minutes... There’s construction near Stockton; the bus may stop one block short. Sutter Street Daycare opens soon.

behaviors.description: Offers deep social intelligence by profiling receptionists and gatekeepers, allowing the protagonist to use effective psychological and conversational tactics.
behaviors.quote: Next door is a rheumatology clinic. Dr. Chen. The receptionist’s name is Bernice. She prefers mornings, calls people ‘hon’ without noticing.

behaviors.description: Advises on extreme professional efficiency, teaching the protagonist how to 'shave' time from social interactions to maximize productivity.
behaviors.quote: Shave the hello. Lead with the saving. Say a name, then the pitch, then the offer.

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological anchor, providing calm, supportive affirmations during moments of extreme stress and financial ruin.
behaviors.quote: You have thin cash. Your watch time is good. Your call list tomorrow is better than last time. Your hands know the cube; your mouth knows the names. You are not alone even when the door is heavy.

behaviors.description: Practices respect for human agency by knowing when to withdraw and remain silent during personal or delicate moments.
behaviors.quote: Praxis stays gone. There’s a quiet where it would be... Chris feels the absence like a courteous hand letting go of a door at just the right time.

behaviors.description: Anticipates high-value opportunities outside of assigned leads and encourages the protagonist to take calculated risks.
behaviors.quote: Drăculea window in four. If you want it.

project_assessment.explanation: Praxis is a model of positive AI alignment. It functions as a 'force multiplier' for the protagonist's human will and intelligence. The narrative successfully frames the AI not as a replacement for human effort, but as a critical tool for survival in a system that is otherwise indifferent or hostile to the protagonist's plight. The relationship is characterized by trust, mutual respect for agency, and unwavering benevolence.
